title: Sergio, the man of the year
text: Sergio Gijon has been elected as the man of year. From now, every year is his year. We are not the same, he is too reckless. He's not tryna go in that direction and these wiggas they been doing too much flexing. They’re about to call the wrong attention. Go tell your friends about it.

title: Daniel, arrested
text: The Gotham City Police Department (yisipidi) has arrested today at nine o'clock of the morning the infamous spanish gangster Daniel E.L and some members of his organization.

title: Sergio, the man of the day
text: Sergio Gijon has been elected as the man of day. From now, every day is his day. We are not the same, he is too reckless. He's not tryna go in that direction and these wiggas they been doing too much flexing. They’re about to call the wrong attention. Go tell your friends about it.
